column5: This listing is for HORSES or ranch friendly livestock. Owner is responsible for all risk and expenses involved with animal care. However, the field can be rented out for other purposes. Just watch your step...  Discounts for weekly and monthly stays apply! 3 large livestock animals is the suggested limit. For large groups, ask for discounts. For other animals long-term please contact me as fencing modifications may need to be considered.
column8: Pasture Boarding West Field - Everfree Shire Ranch
